issue.subject: WFS locator only supports WFS 1.1.0
issue.description:
In the MAP component, the GXP widget AutoCompleteComboBox is used to perform localization with a WFS.
This widget only requests WFS with version 1.1.0.
The easySDI PROXY only supports WFS 1.0.0.
So, localization can not be done on service relayed by easySDI PROXY.

I can see for now, 2 solutions :
- extend the AutoCompleteComboBox widget to support multiple versions
- add to the PROXY the support of WFS 1.1.0 (and 2.0 in the same time?)
